thread.section_title: ScreenCountry Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenCountry Inc | www.screencountry.com
thread.title: Gary Coffey
thread.title_full: ScreenCountry Inc reviewed by Gary Coffey

author: Gary Coffey
title: Gary Coffey
text:
I have a dell latitude 3570 .I left my laptop open and my wife came buy after I went to bed and place mouse on computer .Our cat jumps up on laptop with lid closed on mouse and it cracked my screen ,I ordered a replacement from screen country not ever dealing with this company before.I was pleasantly surprised by the quick delivery and the correct part .Recommend them to others
.Thanks for the service.
